source.name: Marine and Lacustrine Geological Samples (IMLGS) Access Tool
source.description: The IMLGS Data Access Tool provides discovery, viewing, and download of data and information pertaining to seafloor and lakebed geological samples curated by partner institutions. The tool also enables export of information in tab-delimited or KML form. Contact information is provided to request samples from the institutions. Collection-level ISO metadata exists for the database. Web services and a Viewer are also available.
